entry.title: Extreamly Rare Cream Italian Greyhound Puppies
entry.summary: Super Lush Cream puppies. Bred from my two French imports. The dad, Petit Nuage De Magelan Du Zephyr De Bizance, is an elegant boy. He has a very pleasing air and is a joy to watch. The mum, Play It Chance Du Zephyr De Bizance, lives up to her name. She is full of character and life.

entry.title: Italian Greyhound X Whippet /bedlington Puppies

entry.title: Beautiful Kc Reg. Italian Greyhounds
entry.summary: My two beautiful pet dogs have had a litter of four gorgeous girls. They will be good for their new homes in January. They will be twelve weeks old. Microchip and vax as normal. More pics to follow as they get a little older.
